subject: Re: Fwd: [backlog] mirror list updates (this time to the public address)
body:
On Tue, May 15, 2007 at 10:30:48PM +0200, Simon Paillard wrote:
> >   Comment: Mirror from Medellin-Colombia on university hosting
> >   (Private e-mail recorded: NN@tld.com
> 
> I guess it is not private anymore .. (but don't worry, once in the CVS,
> it would have been the same)

No, it wasn't meant to be leaked; the public address goes into CVS, and the
private one remains in the m@d.o mailbox. That's why I separated the two and
called the second one "private".  Please send an apology to that
person, explain to them the eventual impact, and avoid doing that again.

-- 
     2. That which causes joy or happiness.


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
